item.title: Clippers' Beal to have season-ending hip surgery
item.description: Clippers guard Bradley Beal has a fracture in his left hip and will undergo season-ending surgery.

item.title: MSU hit with 3-year probation, 14 wins vacated
item.description: Due to NCAA violations, Michigan State football was placed on a three-year probation Wednesday, a school spokesperson confirmed.

item.title: Sources: AD won't play until OK from Mavs owner
item.description: Mavericks governor Patrick Dumont wants medical data on Anthony Davis' left calf strain before giving his OK for the 10-time All-Star to return, sourc...

item.title: St. Brown apologizes if 'Trump dance' offended
item.description: Lions wide receiver Amon-Ra St. Brown apologized on his podcast if he "offended anyone" with his "Trump dance" touchdown celebration Sunday while Pres...

item.title: McDaniel 'indebted' to Quinn over sobriety fight
item.description: Mike McDaniel said he is "forever indebted" to Dan Quinn because the Commanders coach helped steer him toward sobriety.
